Class ListGraph

java.lang.Object
AbstractGraph
ListGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph
public class ListGraph extends AbstractGraph
A ListGraph is an extension of the AbstractGraph abstract class that uses an array of lists to represent the edges. Taken from book
